# Protection +5
## Overview
**Aura** faint abjuration; **CL** 5th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 50,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This ring offers continual magical protection in the form of a deflection bonus of +5 to AC.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Shield of Faith (Spell)|shield of faith]],* caster must be of a level at least three times the bonus of the ring

**Cost** 25,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 481
